page.title: 07Garages in Brightwell
page.content:
{Bell Garage}My Dad runs Bell Garage and he has worked there for 12 years. Four people work for him. He sells petrol at about 190p a gallon and diesel fuel. He services cars and repairs the bodywork of damaged vehicles. He also does M.O.T. tests for older cars. He also sells spare parts, oil and cold drinks. In the past years the garage has been much improved by the addition of new petrol pumps, a spray shop and a new M.O.T. testing bay. The garage can be found on High Road, Brightwell. Shane Maciak (Age 11)
{Brightwell Garage} is also known as Rodlay Motor Services. They are ready to repair, service and overhaul cars and can be found on The Street, Brightwell.
